SELECT d.`value`,d.label,d.sort, CASE WHEN d.`value` = 'app' THEN 'app' ELSE o.`code` END AS office_id, CASE WHEN d.`value` = 'app' THEN 'app' ELSE o.`name` END AS office_name FROM sys_dict as d LEFT JOIN sys_office as p on d.`value` = p.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_office as o on p.id = o.parent_id WHERE d.type='appOrg' and (o.`name` != 'app' or o.name is null) ORDER BY d.sort
